snippet: Fiat Chrysler Automobiles is recalling almost 505,000 2011-16 Dodge Chargers.
abstract: Fiat Chrysler Automobiles is recalling almost 505,000 2011-16 Dodge Chargers, including about 442,000 in United States, due to concerns vehicle is at risk of falling off the jack during tire change.
lead_paragraph: Fiat Chrysler Automobiles is recalling almost 505,000 2011-16 Dodge Chargers.

headline.main: Dodges Recalled Because of Risks in Changing Tires
headline.print_headline: Dodges Recalled Because of Risks in Changing Tires
